properties.areaDesc: Washington County; Logan County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet/Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County
properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 6 at 4:55AM MST until January 6 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County,
Northeast Weld County, Morgan County, Logan County and
Washington County.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles, especially
on Interstate 76.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may also occur which
will restrict visbilities at times.
properties.instruction:
Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving
conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk
for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile
vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured
properly.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
